Dutch meaning: deduct, also "to jerk off", male masturbation

Afrikaans meaning: generic singular for cattle (cow, bull, etc.)

lightning, also expletive meaning "bastard" (as noun) and "bloody" (as adjective). It can also mean to hit or an intention to hit someone to cause great bodily harm as in "Ek gaan jou bliksem" - "I am going to kill / hit you."
racial slur for black African, literally "wooden head"
mine cart or skip (rolling stock used in mining)

Dutch meaning: Low German Dutch formerly used the term to refer to the Dutch language
pussycat, tabby (although poesje is used as a vulgar term for "vagina")
for, before (written as vóór in Dutch)
